contents.text: Thank you for calling inDinero, your partner in small business accounting and tax services based in San Francisco.
Press 1 for bookkeeping services and support.
Press 1 to speak with a bookkeeper.
All of our bookkeeping specialists are currently assisting other clients. Please hold the line, and we will connect you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need help reconciling last month’s expenses to close my books.
I need help organizing and categorizing my business expenses in the bookkeeping system.
Help me set up automated categorization rules for my bank feed and resolve reconciliation mismatches.
I need help reconciling last month’s bookkeeping entries
I need to speak with a bookkeeper to help me categorize and reconcile my tutoring business expenses.

contents.text: Press 2 for questions about your account balance or statements.
Our account support team is busy at the moment. Please hold, and we'll be with you soon.

navigationGoals: I need to download my latest account statement for payroll review.
I’d like to get a current statement and cash balance for my small business account.
I need to export my March cash flow statement as a CSV for my financial model.
I’d like a copy and explanation of my latest account statement
I’d like to check my current account balance and get a copy of my latest financial statement.

contents.text: Press 2 for tax services and filings.
Press 1 to discuss your upcoming tax deadlines.
All tax advisors are currently on calls. Please stay on the line, and someone will assist you soon.

navigationGoals: I need to confirm my upcoming quarterly tax deadline.
I want to review my upcoming tax payment deadlines for my LLC.
Clarify the due date for my Q2 estimated tax payment and enable deadline notifications.
I want to confirm the due dates for my upcoming tax filings
I need details on upcoming tax deadlines for my tutoring LLC.

contents.text: Press 2 for questions about tax filings you have submitted.
Our tax filings support team is handling other requests. Please hold, and we'll be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I want to check the acceptance status of my recently filed tax return.
I need to check the status of the tax return I recently submitted.
Verify that my 2024 1099 filings were accepted and send me the e-filing acknowledgements.
I’d like to check if my recent tax return has been received and processed
I want to verify the status of my recently submitted tax return.
